name: Awfully Chocolate VivoCity (CAF√â) ‚Äì Bakery, Cake Shop & Birthday Cakes

reviews.text:
Very solid tasting chocolate based cakes. Sweetness is just right and chocolate content is quite high for most of their cakes.
2 slices cost @ $30 so enjoy it slowly.
Seating area is cramped and limited.
It's a shame the server cannot offer complimentary plain water.
Cost $3.50 for water.
Oouch.

This chocolate drink is unbelievably delicious!  The rich, chocolatey flavor is simply divine.  The atmosphere is fantastic ‚Äì relaxed and cool, with great music. I had a wonderful time and will definitely be returning!Thumbs up!

Famous for its chocolate.  The shop was small and housed over 10 tables.

Staff are busy in preparing drinks, serving cakes and manning the cashier.  They are polite and friendly overall.

70% chocolate drink is very nice and smooth.  Personally I would prefer a thicker texture.  Black Forrest Cake is large and great for sharing.

Decent afternoon tea at Awfully Vivo. The Tiramisu here is very delicious, 70% hot chocolate was on point (thought a bit sweet) and the dark chocolate ice cream provides a relaxing and chilled experience.

Overall, a nice place to catch some drinks and desserts for chill out. Thumbs up üëçüèªüëçüèª

Amazing atmosphere. Friendly and professional staffs..
Dark choc ice cream is a must try!

Special shout out to Jayden for his extraordinary service!
